call_summary: Customer reported that her AutoMow 3000 suddenly stopped operating. Agent walked her through a power-cycle and checked the onboard error log (connectivity fault). A ticket was opened and the customer was assured the issue would be resolved by 2024-01-10.

sdc: Was asking about the expired Aquaspray X promotion.
call_summary: Customer inquired about a recently expired promotional offer on the Aquaspray X robotic washer. Explained that the promotion had ended and recommended joining the mailing list to receive notifications on future deals. Customer accepted the suggestion. No further issues were reported. Resolution was expected immediately as no follow-up action was required.

sdc: AutoMow Mini shuts down randomly while mowing.
call_summary: Customer reported that the AutoMow Mini had powered off mid-mow for the first time. Initially assumed to be user error or a one-off fault. Customer was asked to observe further and report back if issue persists. Promised resolution if problem reoccurred within the week.

sdc: AutoMow Mini shut down again mid-use.
call_summary: Customer followed up to say the mower shut off again. We began a basic diagnostics process but did not escalate yet. Informed customer to keep device running under observation. Estimated resolution by early next week.

sdc: Still having the same AutoMow Mini shutdown issue.
call_summary: Customer expressed growing frustration as the mower continued shutting off. Noted that issue is now clearly persistent. Escalation initiated to product support team. Promised an update within 3 working days.
